title: Type in Roeber & Crane Bros Poster
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know of a typeface close to the likely hand drawn ones (Reg and Italic) used in this poster?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226im_/http:/typophile.com/files/704px-Roeber_and_Crane_Bros_5762._Vaudeville_Athletic_Co.,_Ernst_Roeber,_champion_of_the_world,_wrestling_poster,_1898.jpg)
author: bfingeroth

comments.content:
not that it "matches" but Chicago has similarities in some of the characters. emphasis on "some."

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226im_/http:/typophile.com/files/screen_3856.png)

edit: and this one's interesting.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/smeltery/vernissage/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/smeltery/vernissage/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/smeltery/vernissage/")

My selection (Italic could be done by shearing Regular): [Kirsty](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/kirsty/) (Serifs Needing To Be Removed - SNTBR), [Brothers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/brothers-ot/) (SNTBR), [Heretic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/heretic/) (SNTBR), [Dime Box](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/dime-box-wbw/) (SNTBR), [Slinger](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/slinger/) (compressed), [Concave Tuscan](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/concave-tuscan/), [Vintage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dsgnhaus/vintage-gothic/), [Concave Tuscan X](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/concave-tuscan-x/), [Gothic Tuscan](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/gothic-tuscan/), [Mineesota](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/minnesota/), [Teniers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823194226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/teniers/) (SNTBR)
Thanks for the suggestions! I really appreciate it.
